about.short: Quant-Grade is an internal trading engine that runs multi-timeframe analysis on Indian equities and crypto, producing rule-based signals, risk levels, and optional automation hooks.
about.long:
Quant-Grade brings structure to discretionary trading by treating every instrument through the same rule-based pipeline. The engine ingests market data, runs quant and technical models across multiple timeframes, and outputs directional bias with suggested levels.

Signals surface in a web dashboard and can be piped to alerts or broker adapters for paper or live trading. The engine is modular, making it easy to test strategies, add AI-driven regime checks, and move toward a SaaS or white-label offer.

roles_and_responsibilities: Defined the product vision spanning research, alerts, and execution modes.
Designed the engine layers for data, features, signals, risk, and execution.
Implemented Python services plus the web dashboard for watchlists and signal views.
Planned alerting, broker adapters, and environment toggles (backtest/paper/live).
objectives: Provide disciplined, multi-timeframe analysis for stocks and crypto under one engine.
Reduce emotion by enforcing rule-based entries, exits, and sizing.
Keep the system modular for future SaaS or white-label use.

core_engine: Data ingestion for Indian equities/indices and crypto pairs.
Timeframes from 1m to 1W with trend/momentum/volatility features.
Signal engine with directional bias, confidence, and trade hypotheses.
Setup generation with entry, stop-loss, and take-profit levels.
ai_and_quant_layer: Model-driven scoring to shortlist instruments per session.
Regime awareness to distinguish trending vs ranging conditions.
Alignment checks so trades trigger when multiple timeframes agree.
dashboard: Instrument detail view with OHLC chart and signal overlays.
Signal summary showing bias, aligned timeframes, and suggested risk.
risk_management: Configurable max risk per trade and per day.
Daily loss limits with blocking when breached.
automation_and_alerts: Paper execution engine for strategy dry runs.
Broker/exchange adapters planned for Indian brokers and major crypto venues.
admin_and_config: Strategy toggles and parameter controls without code changes.
Environment modes for backtest, paper, and live.

backend: Python services for engine, data ingestion, and feature pipelines.
FastAPI / Django REST Framework for APIs and task orchestration.
Workers/queues for scheduled jobs and broker calls.
quant_and_data: Pandas/NumPy for processing with custom indicator library.
Pluggable AI/ML models for scoring and classification.
Structured time-series storage for signals and prices.
frontend: React / Next.js dashboard for live-ish views.
Reusable charts for OHLC, indicators, and signal overlays.
database_and_storage: PostgreSQL for users, configs, signals, and trade logs.
Redis for caching latest signals and watchlists.
integrations: Planned broker APIs for NSE/BSE participants.
hosting_devops: Dockerized services deployed on VPS/cloud with env separation.
CI/CD for pushing engine and dashboard updates.
Monitoring for task queues and signal freshness.

research_and_design.summary: Studied trader workflows and locked system architecture and strategies.

engine_v1.summary: Implemented ingestion, feature calc, and base signal engine with backtests.

dashboard_v1.summary: Built web dashboard for watchlists, signals, and notifications.

internal_launch.summary: Started simulated and light live runs to validate signals and UX.

ongoing_rnd.summary: Continuous tuning of strategies, models, and risk parameters toward SaaS.

budget.notes: Equivalent value for research, engine development, dashboard, and infra; mainly internal time and cloud costs.

challenges: Serving both Indian equities and crypto with one architecture and UX.
Balancing depth for advanced users with clarity for semi-beginners.
Keeping risk controls strict so trades stay disciplined.
solutions: Separated data, signals, risk, and execution layers so each can evolve independently.
Focused the dashboard on a handful of readable metrics instead of indicator overload.
Embedded environment modes and risk limits to block undisciplined trades.

qualitative: Reusable engine that covers both Indian markets and crypto.
Standardized scoring and shortlisting to cut noise.
Strong base for a future retail/SaaS offering under the Quant-Grade brand.
outcomes.example_metrics_note: Current success is measured in stability, backtest coverage, and signal consistency; live numbers will come post productionization.
